Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every

extended_input_schema.hint: Set a time to schedule the job using supported formats only. Learn more
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger at

extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.
extended_input_schema.label: Start after

input.sql:
select id,
     rhsc_source_id_c,
     opportunity_numbers,
     created_by_id,
     created_by_name,
     activity_date,
     source_system_c,
     current_acv,
     new_acv,
     status 
FROM PARTNERPROGRAMS_DB.MARTS.LOYALTY_STAGE_TJ_UPDATES

extended_input_schema.hint:
Set an upper limit for this wait action. If one or more of the async
jobs take longer than this, proceed to the next step without waiting.
Maximum is 120 minutes.
extended_input_schema.label: Timeout limit (minutes)
extended_input_schema.name: timeout

extended_input_schema.label: Items
extended_input_schema.name: list_items

extended_input_schema.label: Items
extended_input_schema.name: list_items

properties.hint: When Yes, action will return once Salesforce processes all the rows in the CSV file. When No, action will return once the CSV file is uploaded to Salesforce.
properties.name: wait_to_complete

properties.label: CSV chunk size for each Salesforce bulk job (in MB)
properties.hint:
If the CSV file is greater than the chunk size, this action will automatically create multiple Salesforce bulk jobs.
Defaults to 100MB.
properties.name: csv_chunk_size

block.name: insert_to_list_batch
block.comment:
purpose - Update list variable to capture logs
update for story:
1. ECM-90010

purpose - This Step Added because list item action throw error when no failure found in saleforce write action
update for story:
1. ECM-90010

block.name: send_mail

input.subject: ="Workato Loyalty Bookings Transaction Journal Update Job Status | Job ID : " + _dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_id"]}')
input.body:
="ID: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_id"]}') || '') + "
" + "URL: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_url"]}') || '') + "
" + "Name: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_name"]}') || '') + "
" + "Path: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["recipe_path"]}') || '') + "
" + "Job ID: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_id"]}') || '') + "
" + "Job URL: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"job_context","path":["job_url"]}') || '') + "

" + "Results:
" + "Total Records: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"b80d636d","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"TotalRecords"]}') || '') + "
" + "Success: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"b80d636d","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"SuccessRecords"]}') || '') + "
" + "Fail: " + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"b80d636d","path":["list_items",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"FailedRecords"]}') || '') + "

" + "Errors:
" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + "" + ( (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"d3fdab45","path":["list_items"]}') || []) .format_map( "" + "" + "" + "" + "" ) ).join("") + "
Transaction Journal IDRelated DetailError Message
%{LogList_transaction_journal_ID}" + "Transaction Journal ID: %{LogList_transaction_journal_ID}
" + "ACV Amount: %{LogList_ACVAmount}" + "		%{LogList_Message}
"

block.comment:
purpose -Send Mail Pass Fail records from Action Saleforce write
update for story:
